mesmarize.name: Lyra
sentences: Real doesn’t mean solid. This place builds itself around you now. You’re shaping it.

options.full_text: It's fine. None of this is real… right?

Memory_bleads.name: Lyra
sentences: Memory bleeds. And you… you’re bleeding a lot.

offer.name: Lyra
sentences: These started appearing after you woke up.
Find them, Maybe if you put them together… you’ll remember why.

options.text: Sounds like a waste of time.

accepted.name: Lyra
sentences: Good. The forest remembers. Listen closely.

dismissed.name: Lyra
sentences: Then keep wandering. The pieces won’t wait forever.

quest_active.name: Lyra
sentences: The fragments are still out there. You’ve found some, but not all.

quest_done.name: Lyra
sentences: You found them all. The picture is whole again.
But wholeness doesn’t always mean peace. Remember that.
If you really want to understand what you’ve restored… go to the old market.
The air there hums with what was left behind — memories that never let go.

market_transition.name: Lyra
sentences: Follow the flickering lights. They’ll lead you to what still lingers.
